bibl.title: Ptolemais Euergetis and the City of the Arsinoites.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was read at the Fourteenth International Congress of Papyrology in Oxford on July 29, 1974. - The nomenclature of the site in the Roman period.
bibl.seg: Oates John F., Ptolemais Euergetis and the City of the Arsinoites.
A version of this paper was read at the Fourteenth International Congress of Papyrology in Oxford on July 29, 1974. - The nomenclature of the site in the Roman period.
